title: This Week in Tech: Strava Strategy Reveal, Colors Make Matching Easy, AI Training in the WorldTour, and Collaborative Route Planning
content:
This week in tech we see what Strava is planning, what the competition is planning, and there's colors for your Hammerhead and helmet.

Read the full article at This Week in Tech: Strava Strategy Reveal, Colors Make Matching Easy, AI Training in the WorldTour, and Collaborative Route Planning on Velo.
author: Josh Ross
